comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: B-25J serial 44-30058 assigned to the 104th Base Unit at Mitchel Field, NY crash-lands at Newark Municipal Airport, NJ on 23 July 1948. It looks like there was a post-crash fire; it's assumed there weren't any fatalities, since the crash isn't coded as 'fatal' according to www.aviationarchaeology.com .

comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: Using my imagination, I can see a charred body there - you're welcome to order the accident report and verify...
